originalText.text:
Colman was so knowledgeable as he showed us the WTC, Yankee Stadium & other sights with lots of enthusiasm & plenty stories which made it more interesting & enjoyable !! Had a brilliant time !
Highly recommend him if you visit NY !!

text.text:

Highly recommend him if you visit NY !!

originalText.text: A tour guide with a difference!   Coleman shares a real New Yorker's insight into the city.  He went out of his way to really understand what we wanted to see and explore.  A fantastic tour taking us on the subway to the One World Trade Centre and 9/11 Memorial and Museum. Coleman was very knowledgeable and shared his own personal insights and stories.  A fun and very interactive tour with Coleman who is really personable and friendly.   Highly recommend!

text.text: A tour guide with a difference!   Coleman shares a real New Yorker's insight into the city.  He went out of his way to really understand what we wanted to see and explore.  A fantastic tour taking us on the subway to the One World Trade Centre and 9/11 Memorial and Museum. Coleman was very knowledgeable and shared his own personal insights and stories.  A fun and very interactive tour with Coleman who is really personable and friendly.   Highly recommend!

originalText.text: My wife and I were in NYC for a few days, visiting from Ireland so we were trying to pack a lot in, in a short period of time. Coleman was the perfect tour guide as he's a 'New Yorker', born and bred!! He carefully planned our route in advance based on what our interests were and he knew exactly what to show us in the small amount of time we had. We got a great tour of Central Park and the Upper West Side, his knowledge of the area was incredible and very interesting. Most of all though, he was just an excellent host - he really wanted the most for us, his enthusiasm and love of NYC was evident throughout and he made us feel like real New Yorkers for a couple of hours!! Would definitely recommend to anyone visiting NYC!

originalText.text: Excellent Tour and Fantastic Value, Colman gave our touring party of (8-10) Irish and English guests a trip we will never forget. His knowledge of the city and its Boroughs,  his passion for both New York and it's history is delivered with great energy. A New York must do! Thanks Colman, I will be back for a different borough tour soon :)

originalText.text:
If you want to know the real New York, Colie is the perfect guide and comes highly recommended.

We had already taken one of those NYC bus tours, and it was great for what it offered, but we wanted something more to make us feel like we visited the "real" New York and not just the flash. We happened to stumble on Colie's website and after talking to him, he seemed like he was genuinely interested in our interests and we decided to try him out.

Not only did we revisit some of the landmarks in detail (e.g. Freedom Tower, Charging Bull), but we also navigated the New York subway with lots of detailed info from Colie, knowing what the various street signs meant (yes, there is a "secret" behind the colours), going to various parts of Harlem and the Bronx - it really made us feel like New Yorkers for a week!

If I have any family or friends visiting NYC, first thing I'll tell them is check out Colie and arrange a tour with him! One great thing with Colie is he did a customised tour based on what we told him, so don't just assume he only does the suggested tours on his website!
